air.title: Air quality
air.tooltip: Foreign smells (from fields, factories, etc.). How nice to breathe.
air.caption: 1 - bad, 5 - awesome

water.title: Water quality
water.tooltip: Water problems (smell, taste, color, itching). How good it is.
water.caption: 1 - terrible, 5 - good

logistic.title: Basic and social facilities
logistic.tooltip: The number and quality of shops, cafes, entertainment facilities, hairdressers, gyms, etc. nearby.
logistic.caption: 1 - awful, 5 - great

transport.title: Transport and location
transport.tooltip: How easy it is to get to the needed places by public or personal transport, bicycle, on foot.
transport.caption: 1 - poor, 5 - nice

noize.title: No light and noise pollution
noize.tooltip: How much noise and light disturbs. 1 - disturbs strongly, 5 - does not disturb.
noize.caption: 1 - noizy, 5 - quietly

clean.title: Cleanliness and tidiness
clean.tooltip: The amount of garbage. Caring for the appearance of the entrances/lawns/areas.
clean.caption: 1 - dirty, 5 - clean

chill.title: Outdoor activities and walks
chill.tooltip: The presence of parks, water, walks and bike paths nearby, as well as their equipment.
chill.caption: 1 - far, 5 - nearby

safety.title: Safety
safety.tooltip: How safe does it feel to live in this area compared to other places.
safety.caption: 1 - anxious, 5 - calmly

pets.title: Life with pets
pets.tooltip: How well tenants treat pets. Walking and training areas.
pets.caption: 1 - tough, 5 - easy

kids.title: Life with kids
kids.tooltip: Infrastructure for children: kindergartens and playgrounds, schools nearby - and security.
kids.caption: 1 - rough, 5 - cool

parking.title: Parking places
parking.tooltip: Parking space problems. 1 - no places, 5 - no problem.
parking.caption: 1 - sad, 5 - terrific

air.title: fresh air
air.description: No one promises mountain air, but Measuremen are generally happy with the air around here.

water.title: clean water
water.description: Water quality is something inhabitants are proud of.

logistic.title: bread and circuses
logistic.description: Infrastructure is great, everything you need at your fingertips.

transport.title: excellent location
transport.description: A great place to start heading wherever you want to go.

noize.title: silent hills
noize.description: Word is, one can enjoy the silence somewhere here.

clean.title: nice
clean.description: It's nice! What more did you expect?

chill.title: let's walk
chill.description: Up for a bit of nature? Consider this neighbourhood.

safety.title: safe
safety.description: Measuremen used to feel comfortable and safe in this district.

pets.title: I've a dog and a cat and...
pets.description: You don't? Well, this should be a good place to start.

kids.title: parent-friendly
kids.description: Used to worry about your kid? Everyone here knows how it feel.

parking.title: car paradise
parking.description: Impossible badge to achieve in a city. Means no problems with parking.

pairedInfrastructure.title: center of the world
pairedInfrastructure.description: Great location and infrastructure. Easy to start your journey but why bother if everything's already here.

pairedWalk.title: walk and breathe
pairedWalk.description: Good air and places to enjoy it.

air.title: can't breathe
air.description: There are people who aren't satisfied with the smells in the air.

water.title: bad water
water.description: Reports say that there are problems with water. It can reduce the quality of life.

transport.title: no transport
transport.description: Getting started from this place can be a problem.

noize.title: bustling
noize.description: Something is constantly prevents inhabitants from enjoying the silence.

clean.title: messy
clean.description: Measuremen don't like how a lot around here looks.

chill.title: concrete jungle
chill.description: Not a lot of places to walk and enjoy the nature.

safety.title: not safe
safety.description: Some reports shows lack of safety.

pets.title: no pets
pets.description: People around here are not ready for domestic animals.

kids.title: kids are problem
kids.description: Measuremen think that rising a child here could be hard.

parking.title: playground is a parking
parking.description: Ratings indicate serious problems with parking places.

comfort.title: comfort
comfort.description: Positive effect. Increases general level of comfort

discomfort.title: discomfort
discomfort.description: Negative effect. Decreases general level of comfort

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: Neutral effect. Doesn't trouble anyone by level of noise

noisy.title: noisy
noisy.description: Negative effect. Noticeable level of noise

nice.title: nice
nice.description: Positive effect. Pleasure to look at

own.title: mine
own.description: You made it, so can't endorse it

firstSlide.text: An interactive encyclopedia of finding the best place to live. Your independent housing advisor 🏡

1.title: We are relevant
1.text1: We show what's important for living from the local people's perspective.
1.text2: See right away all the Points of Interest (POIs), criticism 🤬 and appreciation 😎 that can influence your decision.

2.title: We are simple and useful
2.text1: We help people by saving time, energy and reducing the stress ü§Ø while looking for a home.
2.text2: Let's imagine that we wanted to check what parts of a city have good water quality 💧 It would be just one click from now. That simple. Press the button below.

3.title: We are community driven
3.text1: There are no things like promoted rating or paid review here. Content created for people by people.
3.text2: See what we up to. Influence what we do. Become the creator. We will help you üëã

4.title: We are non-commercial
4.text1: We would love your support, but making the money is not the goal of this project.
4.text2: There are more important things in life üåº

5.title: We are privacy oriented
5.text1: Do not trust our words üôà Trust our code üôâ It is open source.
5.text2: We can't sell or lose your personal data because we don't collect it üôä

list.text: Check the Measureland guidebook (tutorial)
Learn about our goals and dreams
Write a guide and make money
Visit support page (FAQ)
See our terms of use
... or privacy policy
Find the rest at our blog

lastSlide.title: And this is only the beginning of the journey

startScreen.checkboxText: By using Measureland I agree with

clusters.titleGrp: This group of places average rating's about

menuSidebar.sendCrashReports: Send anonymous error and usage reports

filterSidebar.title: Set up filters
filterSidebar.footerText1: Do you like our free features without any ads?
filterSidebar.footerText2: , so we can keep it that way!
filterSidebar.footerTextSmall: (73% of those surveyed agreed to support Measureland)

timelinePoint.clickToExpand: Average rating from the user is {0}. Click to expand.

quizPopup.soYouWantToRate: So you want to rate the place. Before we start, there is one important question to answer. We expect an honest answer, thank you!
quizPopup.doYouHavePersonalExperience: Do you have personal experience of living at the given place?
quizPopup.imageTitle: Picture of a crowd looking at you
quizPopup.beSincere: Be sincere. Help us and we will help you back!
quizPopup.tenCriteria: Great, thanks. There are about ten criteria you will need to rate in order to submit your rating. You can skip and return later, there is an opportunity to leave a comment at the end. Let's start with
quizPopup.timelineSelectTitle: How old the knowledge you based on your answer is? It's important to know how relevant it is.
quizPopup.yearSelectTitle: Or pick the approximate year of your last experience.
quizPopup.timelineSelectOption1: My info is maximum 2 years old (accurate)
quizPopup.timelineSelectOption2: My info is 2 - 7 years old (somehow accurate)
quizPopup.timelineSelectOption3: My info is more then 7 years old (not accurate)
quizPopup.isThereAnythingToAdd: Is there anything you'd like to add?

showRatingPopup.shareThisRating: Copy a link to this rating
showRatingPopup.howMuchPeople: How much people are actually lived here
showRatingPopup.descriptionOWM: Data's based on average air quality for the last year: openweathermap.org
showRatingPopup.descriptionWAQI: Data's based on the last air quality check: waqi.info
showRatingPopup.descriptionNaturalDisaster: Safety (by country) based on natural disaster risk (1 - high chance, 5 - low chance), measured in the World Risk Index: wikipedia.org

howToRatePopup.soYouWantTo: So you want to measure land
howToRatePopup.findNeededTown: Find a needed town (search at the top left)
howToRatePopup.lookForPlace: Look for a place where you have experience of living
howToRatePopup.clickIt: Click it! Or touch the screen
howToRatePopup.rateAllCriteria: Rate all criteria in the appeared modal

loggedInPopup.learnWhyLimits: Learn why there are limits and how to increase this number
loggedInPopup.learnWhyLimitsAddition: It's free, we just need to confirm you're a nice person :)
loggedInPopup.hereSomeArticles: Here are some articles to help you get started or remind about

list.text: Measureland guidebook (tutorial)
Support
News in Telegram

onboardingPopup.title: Thank you for registration!
onboardingPopup.caption: You'll help us by answering this two simple questions (default values applied if skipped), and we would help you if you were looking for a new place to live in the future :)
onboardingPopup.yourName: Your name. If skipped, you're going to appear as ¬´{0}¬ª in the comments

confirmForgotPasswordPopup.title: Check your email
confirmForgotPasswordPopup.text: We sent a letter to the given email. By clicking the link inside you'll get to the new password form. Once you submit new password, old one stops to work

checkEmailPopup.title: Check your email
checkEmailPopup.text: One of the stages in fighting with cheating - verification of users by email - so we sent a letter to you. We know you can't wait to start rating the places, so once you confirm yourself you can start. Check it out :)

myPlacesPopup.title: Your ratings
myPlacesPopup.youHaveNotRated: You have not rated anything yet. Find a familiar place, click the map and rate!
myPlacesPopup.noPOIs: You haven't added Point of interest yet :(

askForMoreRatingsPopup.title: Done
askForMoreRatingsPopup.weProcessingRequest: We're processing your request now. Can not guarantee to resolve it fast - our team is tiny right now, but the workload is huge. Learn how
askForMoreRatingsPopup.limitationsExist: These limitations exist as one of the layers of protection.
askForMoreRatingsPopup.youCanTryFasten: You can try to fasten this process, write us an email:

feedbackPopup.title: Feedback
feedbackPopup.inputTitle: Define what is it what you want to talk about. Something like 'Suggestion' or 'Fix' should be fine.
feedbackPopup.textAreaPlaceholder: It would be nice if you added a few more points into the quiz. Like internet quality or cultural life.

changeYearPopup.title: Change the relevant year
changeYearPopup.selectTitle: Pick the approximate year, your rating you rating was relevant at the given address: ¬´{address}¬ª

addPOIPopup.title: Add the Point of interest
addPOIPopup.inputTitle: Pick the name that reflects what you want to describe most, for example ¬´Central park¬ª or ¬´Biggest hypermarket¬ª
addPOIPopup.inputPlaceholder: Example: small park with a lake.
addPOIPopup.text: Now describe the place. Try pros and cons. Goal is to show why it's important to know about it beforehand while house searching.
addPOIPopup.textAreaPlaceholder: Breath of fresh air and the rest for eyesight. Clean green island with a lot of benches, playgrounds and cycleways...

tagsInput.title: add a tag
tagsInput.description: Current number of tags is limited only by our developers' imagination. If you think we need others, use our form to

addCommentPOIPopup.title: Adding your comment
addCommentPOIPopup.description: Do add a comment to share an additional info or point to the non-relevance of the current one.
addCommentPOIPopup.textAreaPlaceholder: I agree with the author, though I'd like to add that there is...

onMapClickDialog.title: What do you want to do?
onMapClickDialog.subtitleText: about Ratings and Points of Interest.
onMapClickDialog.warNote: For all we know, there might be a war here. Be safe and try not to include politics in the review, if possible.
onMapClickDialog.option1: Rate a place (water / air quality and so on)
onMapClickDialog.option2: Add Point of Interest (park, construction, etc.)
onMapClickDialog.alternativeTitle: We detected an unrecognized map click!
onMapClickDialog.alternativeDesc1: To leave your mark on the map you will need to get a Measureland residence permit (register and log in).
onMapClickDialog.alternativeDesc2: But don't be scared! Email and 2 minutes of your time are all the things you need for that.

warningPoiNearbyDialog.title: Did you check Points of Interest (POIs) nearby?
warningPoiNearbyDialog.multipleDesc: We have found {numberOfPois} other POIs within a small distance. Are you sure that what you want to add isn't relevant to them?
warningPoiNearbyDialog.singleDec: We have found 1 other POI within a small distance. Are you sure that what you want to add isn't relevant to it?
warningPoiNearbyDialog.desc: If so, please, continue to creating a new POI. Otherwise add a comment to the already existing one. Thanks!

reportReasonDialog.title: Telling us the reason makes your report more effective
reportReasonDialog.irrelevantNotProved: Doesn't look plausible though I can't be sure (invalid info)
reportReasonDialog.textareaPlaceholder: Tell us what is wrong here.

input.passwordError: Password should be longer than 6 characters!

limitError.textBeforeLink: You have exceeded your limit of requests. There are
limitError.textBetweenLinks: : either you a bad guy who for some reason wants our people-helping service to go down or our system is being not ideal. We are strongly believe it's a second one. If you
limitError.textAfterLinks: we would try to help you and have an opportunity to become better. But for now you need to wait a little to enter Measureland again. Sorry for the inconvenience.

errors.samePass: The pass is the same as previous. Pick another one.
errors.manyAttempts: Too many attempts, wait a bit!
errors.nearbyPlaceAlreadyRated: Nearby place is already rated by you
errors.sessionExpired: Session expired, please, refresh and login.
errors.youRateTooOften: You spent all the ratings. We'll add some in a few days.
errors.noResponseFromServer: Unfortunately, there is no response from the server. Try later or contact us:

SEO.title: Measureland - An interactive encyclopedia of searching for accommodation.
SEO.description: Check city or neighborhood ratings. Find tips from community on how to find an accommodation. Looking for air or water quality? We have it!
SEO.keywords: Measureland, encyclopedia, community based, Non-commercial, Open-source, service, Roman Smunyov, RomanistHere, independent, real estate, map, ratings
SEO.subject: Free encyclopedia. Help people to find the best place to stay at or live in.
SEO.author: Roman Smunyov

blog.title: Measureland - Articles and guides.
blog.descriptionSEO: Latest project news, guides and much more. Find your way through Measureland.
